title: Snoop Dogg Visits a Football Game in Wales
summary: Snoop Dogg, a famous rapper, went to a football match in Swansea, Wales. He is part-owner of the Swansea City football team. During the game, he walked around the stadium with music playing and waved a towel while fans cheered for him. The match was between Swansea and Preston North End, two teams in the Championship league. Snoop Dogg often goes to big sports events around the world, like the Olympics and the Super Bowl. This visit was special because it showed how celebrities can be involved in sports teams, making games more exciting for fans.
